text: Karen Lis Nilheim (5 June 1944 – February 2025) was a Swedish actress. She was born in Stockholm, Sweden. She was known for her roles in Äktenskapsbrottaren (1964), Maria (1975), Father to Be (1979), Du är inte klok, Madicken (1979), Madicken på Junibacken (1980), To Be a Millionaire (1980) and Raskenstam (1983). Nilheim died in February 2025 in Stockholm at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Swedish stage actors Category:Actors from Stockholm
title: Lis Nilheim
